title: ServiceNow Performance - Security Incident Overview
description: This dashboard provides insights related to incidents in the Service Incident module, capturing details such as incident identifiers, statuses, priority levels, and affected services. It helps track and manage incidents from detection to resolution, supporting proactive incident management and analysis.

definition.content:
The Security Incident module in ServiceNow helps organizations manage and respond to security threats by tracking, investigating, and resolving security incidents efficiently.

This dashboard provides insights related to incidents in the Service Incident module, capturing details such as incident identifiers, statuses, priority levels, and affected services. It helps track and manage incidents from detection to resolution, supporting proactive incident management and analysis.

**Tips:**
- Use the timeframe selector in the upper-right corner of the dashboard to change the default timeframe.
- Clone this dashboard to rearrange, modify, and add widgets and visualizations.


For more information, see the [ServiceNow Performance Integration Documentation](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/servicenow_performance/).
